summary: We testified about our work related to the Federal Air Marshal Service. The agency deploys air marshals, who provide onboard security on some U.S. airlines' domestic and international flights. Since 9/11, threats have continued to evolve. Keeping the airways safe has been a national priority. We've issued 20 recommendations since 2016 that focus on the agency's organizational performance and management of its workforce. As of...
title: Federal Air Marshal Service: Recommendations to Address Organizational Performance and Workforce Challenges Largely Implemented
